text:
is a song that is by Radwimps. Radwimps is a Japanese band. It was one of the theme songs that was used in "Your Name". It reached number one on Billboard Japan Hot 100. It was also certified for over one million downloads of the song.
The song was used in the movie trailers for "Your Name". It was released on 25 July 2016, before the release of the movie. It was used to promote the movie.
Sales and certifications.
!scope="row"| South Korea (Gaon)
